channel.title: How can i changed the speech voice to a male voice( by default is a famle voice) – Politepix

item.title: How can i changed the speech voice to a male voice( by default is a famle voice)
item.dc:creator: ortal1920
item.description:
Hi,
In the site there the following sentence are wriiten:
“Use any of 9 voices for speech, including male and female voices with a range of speed/quality level, and switch between them on the fly”

So how can i changed the speech voice to a male voice( by default is a famle voice)?

item.title: Reply To: How can i changed the speech voice to a male voice( by default is a famle voice)
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

You can download the other voices for FliteController at the OpenEarsExtras repo (link is in the docs) or you can change the voice settings using the FliteController API (described in the FliteController documentation and header, and on the OpenEars web page).
